content: वाम {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Left(<ab>opp.</ab> दक्षिण); विलोचनं दक्षिणमंजनेन संभाव्य तद्वंचितवामनेत्रा <ls>R. 7. 8</ls>; <ls>Me. 78</ls>, <ls n="Me.">96.</ls> {@--2@} Being or situated on the left side; वामश्चायं नदति मधुरं चातकस्ते सगंधः <ls>Me. 9</ls>; (वामेन is used adverbially in the same sense; {%<ab>e. g.</ab>%} वामेनात्र वटस्तमध्वगजनः सर्वात्मना सेवते <ls>K. P. 10</ls>). {@--3@} ({%a%}) Reverse, contrary, opposite, adverse, unfavourable; तदहो कामस्य वामा गतिः <ls>Gīt. 12</ls>; <ls>Māl. 9. 8</ls>, <ls>Bk. 6. 17.</ls> ({%b%}) Acting contrary, of an opposite nature; यांत्येवं गृहिणीपदं युवतयो वामाः कुलस्यावयः <ls>Ś. 4. 17.</ls> ({%e%}) Perverse, crooked-natured, refractory; <ls>Ś. 6.</ls> {@--4@} Vile, wicked, base, low, bad; <ls>Ki. 11. 24.</ls> {@--5@} Lovely, beautiful, charming; as in वामलोचना <ab>q. v.</ab> {@--6@} Short. --मः {@--1@} A sentient being, an animal. {@--2@} <ab>N.</ab> of Śiva. {@--3@} Of Cupid, the god of love. {@--4@} A snake. {@--5@} An udder, a breast. {@--6@} Prohibited or forbidden act or practice (as drinking wine). --मं Wealth, possessions.
